name: Bog Racer
description:
You have two paths: forward across bridge or over to feed the fish.
In order to avoid falling into water, touch the screen when the car is approaching the edge of the bridge.

• New, unusual car control with just one touch.
• The game requires good reflexes and nerves of steel.
• 13 unique cars. Try to open all of them.

A car after the 150th bridge, is just a dream.

Good luck!
